mapper.insert: insert into customers (Customer_id, Customer_type, Customer_password, Customer_name, Customer_birthday, Customer_zipcode,Customer_basic_address,Customer_detail_address, Customer_email, Customer_phone) values (#{id},#{type}, #{encryptPassword}, #{name}, #{birthday}, #{zipcode}, #{basicAddress}, #{detailAddress}, #{email}, #{phone})
mapper.update: update customers set customer_id= #{id}, customer_password = #{encryptPassword}, customer_phone = #{phone}, customer_zipcode = #{zipcode}, customer_basic_address= #{basicAddress}, customer_detail_address= #{detailAddress}, customer_deleted = #{deleted}, customer_updated_date = sysdate where customer_id = #{id}
mapper.select: select customer_id as id, customer_password as encryptPassword, customer_name as name, customer_birthday as birthday, customer_zipcode as zipcode, customer_basic_address as basicAddress, customer_detail_address as detailAddress, customer_email as email, customer_phone as phone, customer_deleted as deleted, customer_updated_date as updatedDate, customer_created_date as createdDate from customers where customer_id = #{value}
